name: atlas-divisions-website
description: Atlas Divisions website with modular contact form and brand presence

scripts.deploy: echo "Please use deploy:prod or deploy:staging" && exit 1
scripts.deploy:prod: wrangler deploy src/index.ts --name your-atlas-contact-prod && npm run db:prod:seed
scripts.deploy:staging: wrangler deploy src/index.ts --name your-contact-form-staging --env staging && npm run db:staging:seed
